task_description: Phase 1: Core Libraries - Add Koin 4.x, Decompose 3.x, Arrow 2.x, Mokkery, Turbine to version catalog; Wire Koin into composeApp with platform-specific initialization; Create Decompose RootComponent with Config sealed class for navigation; Add Arrow to shared module with KSP for optics; Verify all targets build (Android, iOS, Desktop, JVM)
